itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 6, 2013
contentencoded:
It's quiz time on Marketplace Tech. 86 percent, 1.63 inches, 30 meters underground, and 30 days: Can you guess what these numbers mean?

We put Marketplace reporter Queena Kim to the test for our latest edition of Silicon Tally. 

Click on the audio player above to play along.
description: 86 percent, 1.63 inches, 30 meters underground, and 30 days: Can you guess what these numbers mean?
title: Are you caught up with tech news? This week's Silicon Tally
teaser: 86 percent, 1.63 inches, 30 meters underground, and 30 days: Can you guess what these numbers mean?
